subject: Basketball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: By the time the Knicks waived him last week, Stephon Marbury had collected about $150,000 a day to sit in exile. But the Knicks are not done paying for Marbury.
snippet: By the time the Knicks waived him last week, Stephon Marbury had collected about $150,000 a day to sit in exile. But the Knicks are not done paying for Marbury.
